Articles.Content:
Nope, haven't even been to the US.

The user below me met someone new today.

More like "had to be associated with". I hate new personnel.

The user below me has ran over an animal with his/her vehicle.

Nada.

The user below me likes all the Star Trek shows

Nope, unless shoes count as a vehicle and running over means stepping on a bug while running.

The user below me is still playing .25 and .90 because of mods.

Nope. Not playing at all at the moment as my new PC is still being tested. :/ Soon

The user below me has been to #KSPOfficial.

Nope, don't know when there was one.

The user below me has vision worse than 20/50 in at least one eye (without corrective lenses).

I think I have 49/50.

The user below me is using an electric device to post.

False. I do it telepathically

Oh alright... I did use an electronic device.

The user below me visited a jungle.

Nope, I've never visited a jungle.

The user below likes coffee.

No, my mother told me not to do drugs

The user below me likes the smell of apple juice, but specifically hates to drink it.

Right. It's not as tasty as it should be.

The user below me things goldcrests are cute.

They're quite nice, actually.

The user below me secretly enjoys watching Phineas and Ferb.

No. Not enough rocket and plane episodes.

The user below me is flammable.

No. I imbibe a small amount of flame retardant chemicals every day. Over time, they have ended up in my skin, rendering me almost completely non-flammable.

The user below me defeated my father in single combat.
Yes. I confused him to such a level that he stabbed himself because he is me and I am he. We are the universe and not even I can stop us.

Yes, Because you didnt ask me anything

TUBM has experienced over 20 Access Violation Crashes

Don't think so...

The user below me speaks fluent Mexican.

false, I speak fluent English.

The person below me can land a space shuttle in KSP on the KSC runway with no engine power.

Alright fine! I cheated! I drove it all the way to the runway with spare RCS fuel!

The user below me has played (wasted their life) on a game which isn't KSP.

Oh goodness yes. The Civilization series, Homeworld series, even old MicroProse games all got their hooks deep into my free time (though not at KSP levels).

The user below me sneezed today.

Nope. I have but a few morals but I stick to them and one of them's no sneezing under ANY circumstances.

The user below me likes Waffles more than french toast.

Yeah, I do prefer waffles

The user below me likes chocolate flavored desserts more than vanilla flavored desserts

Tralse or frue (depends what it is).

The user below me has english as a second language.

Edited December 23, 2014 by LABHOUSE

Nope.

The user below me Likes Star Trek.

false, English is my first language.

The person below me has "ripped one" in the past 5 hours.
